lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: of my belief that everyone, regardless of where they live, deserves a chance to be be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: The Lord has given us many gifts.  It is our job to understand how to best use them to make a positive difference in the world.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to other people's lives, by giving them the power to make changes themselves.  To me, providing someone with a loan, and with the encouragement to follow their dreams, is giving them the opportunity to make a difference to their own lives and to their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working as a teaching assistant and classroom supervisor in schools, mainly with young children aged from 0-11.  I am aiming to train as a Lower Primary teacher next year.  I believe that every human being should have the right to access education, and so I am particularly interested in lending to individuals who are looking for funding to improve their businesses in order to afford funding for their children's education, or to groups which have an educational focus, especially for young people in developing countries.

lenders.name: D Roger Maves
lenders.loan_because:
I've been an entrepreneur all my life and realize how important it can be to get a little help from a friend.
I enjoy giving back and seeing others directly benefit from it.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software (websites) for real estate brokers and agents which help them to market themselves to their prospects.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself. I want to give back to the world some of what I have been blessed enough to receive myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand and train their pet dogs, so that they can achieve a more pleasurable relationship. I help keep dogs in their homes through training, as they are not as likely to be relinquished to shelters if they are well behaved and properly cared for.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a marketing firm that serves attorneys and law firms nationwide.

lenders.name: alysia
lenders.loan_because: I want to and can help make a difference in people's lives. I started a business once and know what a difference even small amounts of money can make to grow it.
lenders.occupational_info: My team works to improve Google Maps.

lenders.name: True
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's important for those of us that have plenty to share with those who struggle.  I'm grateful that Kiva makes this simpler!
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise an assisted living unit that serves 6 developmentally disabled women.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I want to follow Christ's example and I believe that if you "teach a man to fish", you can equip him or her  to further themself and have the chance to pass it on to others.

lenders.name: Habib
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.  As well we are all human beings and we came on earth with nada and leave earth with nada.  But during life some people have nada while some of us do, might as well give....
lenders.occupational_info: I dont know what work is, but I know how to give away money...I go to school!!!

lenders.name: Miyoung
lenders.loan_because: "Teamwork makes the dream work."
lenders.occupational_info: I study the brain and behavior of those with psychiatric disorders.

lenders.name: Patch
lenders.loan_because: my government (regardless of the party) fails to recognise the importance international aid and poverty and this allows me to still make a direct difference
lenders.occupational_info: I do research around youth mental health issues and investigate the most effective treatments for mental disorders in 12-25 year olds.

lenders.name: Heather & Slater
lenders.loan_because: I want to be the change I wish to see in the world. (Gandhi)

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to. My own family means the world to me, and my parents always taught me to give back to others. Now I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I attempt to prevent colon cancer.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because:
I like to assist where possible.
I love Peru
lenders.occupational_info: I translate technology speak to business speak and vice-versa for the common good of the organization.

lenders.name: Magenta
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I will give a Chance...

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in the world grow and develop their careers.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a full time student on my way to getting a Business degree.

lenders.name: Alessandro
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva is a wonderfull project, you can really help people and be sure that your money are going where you want.
You should find a reason to not support it....and if you have found one probably you have to check better :-)
For a better world made by better people
lenders.occupational_info: IT Consulting

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.occupational_info: I coach managers in terms of leading staff members in companies.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: To share is to grow.

lenders.name: Bob & Justin
lenders.loan_because: My Grandmother a school teacher showed me at the age of five the power of giving. I have done this with my son. We believe in a hand up not a hand out. It will be an honor to loan people this money. Thank You Kiva for making this opportunity available to my son and me. Maybe we can change the world! Bob
lenders.occupational_info:
I have been a contractor for many years. I build houses. I build them with my son. We do everything from the ground up. It will take us almost a year to build a home. I like to work with logs building furniture for the homes. My new home will be made of ICF's . They are stiro-foam and a great way to build. 
 I was in Iraq for three years and now I'm in Afghanistan. I support our troops, but choose to do it in Country.

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: I like to read about people's lives on the other side of the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Deaf kids in american sign language.

lenders.name: Keren
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay forward the help that I continue to receive from wonderful people.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: This is a brilliant idea and I want to help.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: Everyone here is trying to improve their own situation and all they need is a little help.

lenders.name: Carol and Brian
lenders.loan_because: We wanted to share our own good fortune and to help our world neighbours to build a better future for themselves.  We have a particular interest in encouraging women's businesses, especially those involving textiles, handcrafts and food products.  We would like to see much more political power in the hands of hardworking and committed women all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Carol is a recently-retired company director enjoying the luxury of freedom from work.   Brian is Technical Director of a hi-tech electronics company and just thinks his work is great fun!

lenders.name: lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I belive the given help to some one is one of the best thing you can do in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with children who are blind.

lenders.name: David Andreas
lenders.loan_because: Lending through Kiva requires so little effort, but can really change the lives of good people in countries that fail to support them.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.occupational_info: I work in professional practice as a share & business valuer.

lenders.name: Baker@DCHS
lenders.loan_because: because we want to help.  We share and we care.  We aren't afraid to lend people in other countries money.
lenders.occupational_info: We go to school and learn.  We are getting an education to have a career and better our future.

lenders.name: Lisa and Stephen
lenders.loan_because: We've been greatly blessed and want to share with others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Serving God and encouraging others to do the same.

lenders.name: Heli
lenders.loan_because: Just .... I can make something good

lenders.name: Alexandra I. Pechirra
lenders.loan_because: I believe everything happens for a reason ... so if you get a chance, take it. If it changes your life, let it! ;)

lenders.name: David and Jen
lenders.loan_because: Because we have been given much we to must give.
lenders.occupational_info: I rent and sell equipment to help people appreciate the outdoors

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Anyone who is willing to work hard to persevere through adversities deserves a chance

lenders.name: Alistair
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in others lives especially those that want to do something for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Skúli
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Software test developer.

lenders.name: Marlie
lenders.loan_because: I teach children with challenges. What more important thing could I teach them than to help others?
lenders.occupational_info: Loving and helping children

lenders.name: jan
lenders.loan_because: .......it is no reason to not do it.........

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful initiatif, and I'm glad to help out other entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Glenda
lenders.loan_because: It is but the grace of God that I was born in a Country where many opportunites are available. I don't take that for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell and support various Telecommunitcation products to Business Customers.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give

lenders.name: Lee Family
lenders.loan_because: The Lord blesses us to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach my children at home and help people stay healthy through exercise and proper diet.

lenders.name: Jens and Christina
lenders.loan_because: We would like to improve life for people in underdevelopped countries

lenders.name: Adora
lenders.loan_because: success starts with being given a chance.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: It takes a world to raise a child, and we're all in that business.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: It's one more way that I can hopefully make a positive difference for an individual, their family and the community that they live in.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping businesses and individuals be the best that they can be.

lenders.name: Bart & Julija
lenders.loan_because: it is exactly what we wanted.

lenders.name: Kurinji
lenders.loan_because: We feel like We can help more people with same money.
lenders.occupational_info: Basically, work in computer software.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: it's a good idea
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a professional body for surgeons. I am setting up a system of regulation.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I sold my car recently so I could live a greener life. With th money I got back from the car, I am trying to make wise investments for my future and want to help other women do the same. I'm interested in learning about green investing and other such things. Microlending makes so much sense for me right now as someone who has some extra cash to spare. Thanks Kiva!

lenders.name: Ivan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching researchers in child health.

lenders.name: Carrol
lenders.loan_because: We are keen to support other people trying to make a living, trying to improve their lives and the lives of people in their own communities.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are both entrepreneurs and engineers.

lenders.name: Rotary Club of Gibsons
lenders.loan_because: It is the Right Thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Our Motto is: Service above Self.  Our Creed is:  Is it the Truth - Will it benefit all concerned - Will it build goodwill and fellowship - Is it fair to all.

lenders.name: michele
lenders.loan_because: just a little bit of help can make big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I beleive that much of the unrest in the world occurs because the powerful silence the voices of the people in whatever way will work.  In my mind keeping people in poverty is the greatest silencer of all.  When I help someone out of poverty I help them find their voice.  And once a person finds her or his voice they have a say in what happens to them.  They become free.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a research hospital.  My job is to review research projects and make determinations concering the safety and ethics of clinical research projects.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: Every day I read so many stories about people around the world who are struggling... I decided it was time to do my part to help.

lenders.name: Nils
lenders.loan_because: I don't know, I just want to help people.  My mom showed me the Kiva site.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a 15 year old high school sophmore.  My high school is very diverse. I went to a dual language school from when I was 5 years old until I was 13, where we studied all subjects in both Spanish & English. I like to surf, skateboard, race triathlon, play water polo & basketball. I'd like to travel and have been to Mexico, Singapore and Indonesia.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help others -- by giving them a way to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business owners who have lost income through employee theft or personal injury.

lenders.name: Gwen Blewett
lenders.loan_because: It is a bigger gift to my soul than to those receiving the funds.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others some of the opportunities that I am so blessed to receive.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Terje
lenders.loan_because:
My Lord Jesus says: So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets (Matt. 7.12.)
I hope to make a positive difference in some peoples lives...

lenders.name: Keana & Fely
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who inspire me.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a software developer who's job allows me to be creative in a tight realm of rigidity but this is truly uninspiring.  The causes of kiva and it's community inspire me.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I record the revenues and expenses for a business so they can track the business's financial performance.

lenders.name: Debbie and Rachel
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of giving a hand up vs. a hand out
lenders.occupational_info: I run the Customer Service department for a small marketing company; my daughter is an 8th grade student

lenders.name: Pauline
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to share. Everyday is an opportunity to do something positive. Pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Improving vision for humanity.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I'm very fortunate, and I want to provide others with opportunity as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I write online content that supports training at a large telecommunications company.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to...do I really need a deep reason?
lenders.occupational_info: I dispose of unexploded bombs, mines, projectiles and the like in order to allow land to be developed, and to safeguard people & property.

lenders.name: Red Shirt
lenders.loan_because: I read about Kiva in a newspaper article and thought what a cool idea to be able to help others thru these loans.
lenders.occupational_info: i work in the tourism industry helping people with holdiay information

lenders.name: Rachel Devlin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I love the feeling that I get when I help others. I believe it is my purpose in life.

lenders.name: Ceyhun
lenders.loan_because: We are one.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I would waste the money on myself otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't work.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I believe that you can create change and help others in this world with just one small heartfelt gift!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their travel plans, to help them experience and understand how other people live, and to provide a chance for people to remove themselves from their everyday world, hopefully returning them refreshed and renewed.

lenders.name: Britt
lenders.loan_because: it's the responsible, caring thing to do!

lenders.name: Joaquin
lenders.loan_because: just because.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people become more productive and do more with their lives.

lenders.name: Daniel Catalaa
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving should be done in a way that promotes growth.  So I love lending money to working people who are industrious, ambitious, and are ready to make a contribution to themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist a team of hospital interpreters. These interpreters help doctors and patients that do not speak English to communicate.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.occupation: Faculty, Dept of Social Work, Cal State East Bay

lenders.name: Kym
lenders.loan_because: It is a great (and simple) way to empower people to make positive changes in their lives.

lenders.occupational_info: I make beautiful things.

lenders.name: Peg
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I have been retired for the last 10 years helping to take care of my grandchildren

lenders.name: Dr. Jean-Jacques
lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other. Microcredit is a great way to develop business worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: I have helped small business and start-ups here in the US (through business incubation)  to grow markets worldwide. Today, we can help developing countries and individuals interested in growing their own business. This website is ideal for small entrepreneurs. We also have a complete team of business and financial experts for larger development projects.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I want to be like Jesus.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying Communications at university to be a preacher.

lenders.name: Tony

lenders.occupational_info: Doing stuff on and with the Internets

lenders.occupational_info: I work in sports management to ensure that student-athletes have the materials, instruction and opportunities to perform at their best on the playing field and in the classroom.

lenders.name: Mathias

lenders.name: Benton Jr High Economics
lenders.loan_because: My 9th grade Economics classes chose KIVA as a community service work.  It is exciting to see how individuals can make a difference in so many lives.

lenders.loan_because: We really can change the world.

lenders.name: Dan

lenders.name: Rafael

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world beyond my door.

lenders.name: Aleks
lenders.loan_because: I am excited my (small) gift will have a huge impact in someone's life.

lenders.name: Shirl & Lib
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do to make this world a better place for everyone!

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my family's business with success & I need to share with people who are trying to make a life.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell to small stores in a 60 mile radius of my home.  They are all family owned.  Everybody works hard for their family.

lenders.name: Yolanda
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to over 35 countries and have seen what poverty is really like and believe that the small contributions that are made by people on Kiva can and will make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write documents that teach people how to use computers.

lenders.name: Pat Patterson
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in a sustainable way. As it's repaid, the money I put into Kiva can be relent again and again.
lenders.occupational_info: I help developers understand how salesforce.com's cloud technologies can help solve real business problems.

lenders.name: Polly
lenders.loan_because: I own a small business, and I want other women around the world to be able to own businesses also.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies create reports to analyze their businesses--where the overdue accounts are, which items are most profitable, etc.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: ENABLE ME TO RENT A SHOP FOR MY GALLARY AND ALSO HELP OPHANS  IN TEACHING THEM HOW TO MAKE CRAFT
lenders.occupational_info: I MAKE PHOTO FRAMES, CALABASH FLOWER POT, AFRICAN CLOCKS

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.occupational_info:
Tampa real estate resource providing extensive property search and MLS search listings Free. Serving Tampa and St. Petersburg Real Estate search and Hillsborough and Pinellas Counties
One stop source for Tampa Real Estate, new homes for sale in Tampa FL, and up-to-date MLS listings in Florida.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: Actually my wife set this loan up as a birthday present to me because she knows how much I want to bless other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a public school teacher.  I teach science and social studies to 8th grade students.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: “...Every human is fated to have one moment in their lives in which they can change their own destiny.”

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I love.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on developing portable diagnostic tools for global health applications.

lenders.name: Harm
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people and make them happy. By funding their needs with a loan, I am able to. If every living soul would help his neighbour, how wonderfull would this planet be?
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching math is a worldly known occupation. I teach kids/adults from the age of 12 till 20. Furthermore I would describe myself as an observer of the world and study the history of the european continent.

lenders.name: Quito the bandito
lenders.loan_because: Individuals featured on Kiva are harding working, responsible people.  Their desire to improve their lives and the lives of their families is great so why not help them achieve their goal?

lenders.loan_because: I give the guy on the corner $25 and he's back there the next day; I loan Kiva $25 and someone learns how to fish. It's not a tough call.

lenders.loan_because: we care.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Thea
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this is a good oportunity to help people in a tangible way whilst knowing exactly where my money has gone.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote to peole from ethnic minority communities that their health is important. I also teach them how to look after themselves and where to go for medical help.

lenders.name: Joe & Kayla
lenders.loan_because: God has truly blessed our lives with Love, Family, and Good Fortune...and we want to share those blessing with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Joe and I are both blessed with two wonderful children and wonderful careers. Joe works for a world wide company based out of Sweden and is in charge of making sure that the suppliers to the U.S. stores ship all the products on time and only use material vendors that are enviromentaly friendly and approved by his company. Kayla maintains relationships with current clients and establishes new relationships to further business....basically Im in sales. We hope that we are able to help people around the world to reach their goals and support their familys. Kiva is a wonderful organization and we send our Thank You to them for enabling us to help you!

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe to those much is given, much is required.

lenders.name: Pallas
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to be in solidarity with people.

lenders.name: Dylan
lenders.loan_because: I can.  (With Mom and Dad's help)
lenders.occupational_info: I am in first grade.  I am learning to read and write.  I am learning about the world.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs help sometime.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan meetings and events, working for a hotel.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to give others the chance to be successful, to build their business and improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Sales Consultant

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.loan_because: I grew up not much better off than many of these people.  It costs me no more than a few lunches to help these people get a leg up.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Honest, hard working people everywhere deserve a chance. And if the money I have sitting around doing nothing (which isn't alot) can help someone...that gives me another reason to smile when I get up in the morning.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an Engineer in the computer industry. My company makes new and inventive ways to save and share data from computers.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: It's always good to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: fullfilling

lenders.name: Susan & Phil
lenders.loan_because: KIVA was a wedding gift to us in Spetember, 2008.  We feel honored to be able to help others help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: RECAUDAR FONDOS PARA LA CONSTRUCION DE UNA INSTITUCION EDUCATIVA PARA NIÑOS ESPECIALES
lenders.occupational_info: iMPORTANTE, YA QUE A TRAVES DE EL PUEDO AYUDAR ANIÑOS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y QUE NO PUEDEN RECIBIR UN TIPO DE EDUCACION ADECUADA

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I loan because, after living for more than a decade in various developing countries, I've seen first hand how micro loans can transform communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to at-risk, immigrant teenagers.

lenders.name: The Fernie Academy
lenders.occupational_info: We are a small independent school in Fernie, BC, Canada.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a website that is a news portal for "ethical fashion." We talk about the latest organic and fair trade fashions!

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I believe in social entrepreneurship, and I understand the prime importance of capital to get a worthwhile idea off the ground. I believe in uplifting others by helping them uplift themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I run two businesses - one is a web solutions company, and the other is the manufacture and sale of honey wine (mead)

lenders.name: Rhonda & Doug
lenders.loan_because: Giving is a present you give yourself.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: we are one.

lenders.name: Meara
lenders.loan_because: its fun, why not

lenders.name: Misty
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy. I believe in the law of karma, and I know by making good causes, my own life and the lives of others will be enriched.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to knit - I taught myself how by reading a book. I am always interesting in hearing someone's knitting or sewing story. I enjoy reading a lot. I like training my Cockapoo puppy Kingston and exercising. I am one of the most fortunate people I know.

lenders.name: Prashant
lenders.occupational_info: Design electrical stuff that test's other electrical stuff

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people are inherently good.  When given an opportunity that they would not have otherwise had, greatness can be achieved.  My favorite quote is "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."  I'm honored to be able to contribute, even in a small way, to the dreams and aspirations of so many amazing individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that encourages children to become entrepreneurs and to succeed in a global economy.  I raise money to help these programs continue.

lenders.name: Madison Reed
lenders.loan_because:
....life's purpose is to create more happiness and beauty!  We're all ONE, so how can I be happy, successful, or reach any degree of spiritual evolution if I'm cut off from the rest of the human family tree?

Giving is a way that I link myself to others.

lenders.name: Bob and Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We are trying to do our part to pay it forward, creating a sustainable source of capital for entrepreneurs to allow them to build a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: my brother sent me a gift certificate. I had seen Kiva before and thought microfinance was a very interesting concept. I hope it will be a sustainable way to help people get on their feet.
lenders.occupational_info: I train customers, do demos and assist with technical designs for a small software company. I also work in the field with customers to install and resolve problems with the software. We make software to filter internet access and protect computers. Our primary customer is K-12 schools.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because:
It's really cool to make a difference for someone on the other side of the planet - and I'm jazzed that it's not a hand-out, but a micro-loan.  

Microcredit lending works - Thanks Dr. Yunus!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with large companies to help them reduce their environmental impact by making their office environment "greener."

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: Loaning to Kiva is not like giving to charity.  It is a sustainable way to ensure your money goes a long way helping the poor start businesses in the country of your choice.  The best part about it is that you get 100% of your money back each time!
lenders.occupational_info: Microfinancing had and is continuing to have tremendous success in the development of many countries.

lenders.name: Sarrah Nomanbhoy
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying at Stanford University in California so that in the future I can help people and make change in the world.

lenders.name: Claude G. Beaudoin
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me in the past and want to spread the feeling of hope and self-pride.
lenders.occupational_info: I run and maintain a web site that offers educational material to help others better understand what stock Technical Analysis is and can do for them.

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: it helps others be self-sufficient and able to provide for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: many others have helped me in life & it's time to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design medical tests to diagnose human diseases.

lenders.name: Randhir V
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people help themselves

lenders.name: Summer
lenders.loan_because: Every one needs help now and again.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy being submerged into a culture other than my own.  I want to learn about people and what makes them different from everyone else.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I almost lost everything at one point and I know how hard it can be to start up a business without any resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I design applications for the internet, do graphic design for the internet and print, and repair computers occasionally.  I am also a Apple Certified Macintosh Technician.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: Recirculating some idle cash has such a positive impact on others less fortunate - and you decide where it will be best used.  This is an efficient and effective way to directly help someone to a better place.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: We live under one sky.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can :)

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others!

lenders.name: Cristele
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed. It's time to share it...

lenders.name: Katharina
lenders.loan_because: I was always lucky and and now it is time to give something back!

lenders.name: lamazone
lenders.loan_because: i believe this is a way to fight poverty and to let people with dreams, but little money fulfill these dreams.

lenders.name: Kamila
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Joe C
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a good cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and do research.

lenders.name: Olivier
lenders.loan_because:
"Si la vie humaine n'a pas de prix, nous agissons toujours comme si quelque chose dépassait, en valeur, la vie humaine... Mais quoi ?"  

"Être homme, c'est précisément être responsable. C'est connaître la honte en face d'une misère qui ne semblait pas dépendre de soi. C'est être fier d'une victoire que les camarades ont remportée. C'est sentir, en posant sa pierre, que l'on contribue à bâtir le monde."

Antoine de St Exupéry
lenders.occupational_info: Also a member of  www.babyloan.org

lenders.name: Hayley
lenders.loan_because: I don't have enough money of my own to change somebodies life but joining it to all the other people that can give just a little is amazing.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the community providing nursing care to people in their own homes.

lenders.name: Selena
lenders.loan_because: The world needs to be a better place - for all.

lenders.name: Margot
lenders.occupation: Titel Insurance Sales and Support Representative

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it's not a level playing field out there.
lenders.occupational_info: I study how social inequalities become health inequalities.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a singer, wife, and mother.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: i believe it will help
lenders.occupational_info: I work with great people at a great company who work together to create and sell a product that helps educate people and helps them communicate better.

lenders.name: pascal
lenders.loan_because: Small rivers make big ones

lenders.name: mr-mike.com
lenders.loan_because: I'm a serial entrepreneur at heart and have been fortunate to always find the right resources to be successful.  I want to help ensure the same access to resources I was afforded when I first started pursuing businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small consulting company for a day-job, but enjoy photography and road cycling as well as cooking and travel for recreation.

lenders.name: Ginny
lenders.loan_because: I am privileged enough to have the money available.

lenders.name: Tomasito
lenders.loan_because: I want the poor people to have a chance to do something they can be proud of.  If I give a seed, they will have something to grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I assemble, test, and repair brushless motor controllers.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I don't know.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with barriers to employment find employment in the community.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I am one of the fortunate ones.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for one of the largest pension firms in the world.  Every day I think about how my efforts are helping others once they retire.

lenders.name: Angela & Thomas Drake
lenders.loan_because:
Because there is no better investment than investing in people.

We've also been to Ghana and seen the need and the benefit firsthand.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to pay forward after wonderful people helped me in the past.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Patric
lenders.loan_because: I believe small business is the foundation for economic success in the world.  Without continued success by small business, democracy cannot survive and its citizens cannot flourish.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy or negotiate goods or services for a state goverenmental agency.

lenders.name: Allie
lenders.loan_because: it just makes sense
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a foundation and issue grants to non-profit organizations in need of funding
